contract.name: gateway_upgradeable
contract.description: Gateway contract implementation for the substrate based chains

docs: Event emitted when a request created to dst chain
events.label: ISendEvent

docs: Event emitted when the chain receive message from other src chain
events.label: IReceiveEvent

docs: Event emitted when the contract receives ack for corresponding isend
events.label: IAckEvent

docs: Event emitted when the dapp sets fee payer
events.label: SetDappMetadataEvent

docs: Event emitted when the valset is updated
events.label: ValsetUpdatedEvent

docs: Event emitted when isend fee is updateds
events.label: BridgeFeeUpdatedEvent

docs: Modifies the code which is used to execute calls to this contract address (`AccountId`).
messages.label: set_code

docs: Simply returns the current value of our `src_chain_id`.
messages.label: get_src_chain_id

docs: Simply returns the current value of our `src_event_nonce`.
messages.label: get_src_event_nonce

docs: Simply returns the current value of our `last_valset_nonce`.
messages.label: get_last_valset_nonce

docs: Simply returns the current value of our `bool`.
